# My Talking Tom

: 31 May 2022

My Talking Tom is a virtual pet game released by Slovenian studio Outfit7 on 11 November 2013. It is similar to Pou and the fourteenth game of the Talking Tom & Friends series overall. It was the first Outfit7 game to feature the smoother animation, and to feature Talking Tom's current design. A similar game called My Talking Angela was released on 3 December 2014, with its sequel released on 13 July 2021. Another similar game called My Talking Hank was released on 2 December 2016. A sequel, My Talking Tom 2, was released on 3 November 2018. Yet another similar game called My Talking Tom Friends was released on 11 June 2020.
It was the first game to be released under the franchise's new name.
Gameplay
The goal of the game is to take care of an anthropomorphic grey tabby cat named Tom who can optionally be renamed by the player. The player is invited to care for Tom and help him grow from a baby kitten to a full-grown tomcat by interacting with him in different ways, such as feeding him, taking him to the bathroom, playing mini games, and tucking him into his bed to sleep when he is tired. Tom can repeat words spoken into the device's microphone for up to 25 seconds using a synthesized voice. Through in-app purchases, in-game currency, or by logging into Facebook (Facebook features were removed in 2018 and before 2020 in older app versions), there is an option to visit Tom's friends (Removed In 2016), or travel around the world using in-game tickets. Using in-game currency, various different outfits, skins, and accessories can be purchased to dress-up and customize Tom. In-game currencies such as coins or diamonds can be earned through various ways including: mini games, a treasure chest, in-game TV ads or special logins. All in-game currency purchases including furniture, appliances, outfits, fur designs, eyes and shops are unlocked at specific levels when using coins, but they are purchasable in any level using diamonds.
Age inappropriate advertising controversy
The game was reported for having advertised age-inappropriate advertisements for adult services. In 2015, the UK Advertising Standards Authority (ASA) ruled that advertising for an adult website was delivered to underage children via the game. The ASA noted that Outfit7 "had a strict advertising policy" but that the company "had not been able to identify which ad network had served an age-inappropriate ad on a children's app" and how the advertisements were shown in the app.
My Talking Tom 2
My Talking Tom 2 is a sequel to My Talking Tom, it was released on 6 November 2018. The game has an identical objective to the original game, with newer additions such as a toybox, pets, and events featuring collaborations between Outfit7 and other entities.
The My Talking Tom 2 app is similar to the My Talking Tom app but with some additions and subtractions. Some additions include:
Pets: Unlike the other game, this one (Talking Tom 2) has pets which you can also take care of. You can chose between:
* A female green Parrot with a per of glasses and pink wings from Adventure Beach, "Flip".
* A male blue robot with a globe on top from Cyber City, "Dot".
* A male purple monster-like creature with two horns from Magic Forest, "Gus".
* A female pink unicorn and the cutest and acspensive pet of all, from Candy Kingdom, "Sugar".
* Tom's original pet, a male mouse-like orange creature, his first appearance is in the kitchen in level 1 when trying to eat a carrot but left, his name is Squeak
The pets you bought are kept in dens and the others need to be bought first. The pets change colour depending on what they eat.
Events: Events such as Tom's birthday or any other event can last up to five days depending on the event. In events you can do many things to get event tokens, such as "ðŸŽ‰" for birthday or "âš“" for Pirates. Event tokens can be used to purchase event things such as clothes, food or furniture items only available in events.
Space Trails: The mini games were subtracted due to many other activities in the Game, but a mini game called "space trails" has been added, allowing the player to play with real People all over the world. The game is played using your chosen pet, and the colour of the trail is the colour of your pet. Player must collect space dust to make their trails longer and larger, if a player crashes on someone else's trail or the asteroid belt around the orina the player is automatically eliminated. The player's goal is to become the biggest, be king and reach No.1 in the top five, but the king's location is visible to everyone.
Islands: My Talking Tom 2 has four different Islands:
* Adventure Beach: A tropical pirate island, were Flip and the Bold Pirate, Pirate Captain, Beach Workout, Beach Party and Freestyle Swimmer outfit belong.
* Magic Forest: A spooky forest with a castle near, were Gus and the King, Outlaw Hero, Crazy Fairy, Noble Knight and Master Wizard outfit belong.
* Cyber City: A high-tech urban city, were Dot and the Policeman, Superhero, Mr. Big Business, Cyber Hero and Fireman outfit belong.
* Candy Kingdom: A huge candy park full of candy, were Sugar and the Chocolate bunny, Gingerbread Man, Biscuit Baker, Lollipop Lord and sweet dreams outfit belong.
Other additions:
* Plane: Every level you gain Plane Tokens, unlike My Talking Tom, you fly to Islands and get a chest with 4 cards, each card contains food, toys for pets, coins and one wardrobe or furniture item
* Toybox: The Toybox contains toys like drums (usually seen in ads), Trampoline, Basketball, Swing and a boxing bag.
* Mixer: Used to make juice. Some juices have special effects like orange juice, used to change Tom's apprentice (clothes, fur, etc.) or apple juice, used to make Tom huge.
* Bathtub: The bath tub has different types of soaps not only to wash Tom, but pets can eat the soaps to make a bubble.
My Talking Tom+
}}
My Talking Tom+ is an mobile game that was released on Apple Arcade, on occasion of the original game crossing 1 billion downloads. This version of the app does not contain ads, a splash screen, in-app purchases, or a Baby or Adult Potion. The release was planned for 12 August 2022 but preponed to 11 August 2022.
Awards
* "Best iPad Game: Kids, Education & Family" at the 2014 Tabby Awards.
* "Best iPad Game: Kids, Education & Family" and "Best Android Game: Puzzle, Cards & Family".
